website_summaries.verdict: A protein-enriched formula that works well at taking out brassy tones.
pros: Has many senior followers, including men
The shampoo delivers a strong purple that can even get the green out of bleached hair exposed to chlorine, and tone down dye mistakes
cons: It has a very "earthy" fragrance which put off some users

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it's not expired
customer_reviews.text: I bought and used this product. Apparently it's 3 years past it's shelf life. I had to call the 800 number on the bottle as after using bleach blonde hair is now gray and purple! Very upset
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Escobedo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my hair!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years and don't like using anything else. Frequently, I am stopped and asked how I get my hair "that color". I inherited the basic color from my mother and her father, but Shimmer Lights keeps it silver and shiny with no yellow. About the odor.... I, frankly, had never even thought about it until I read reviews that said that it had an offensive odor. It certainly is not flowery or perfume-y but I don't find it offensive at all and it doesn't linger on my hair. A word of caution...be conscientious about rinsing, especially on the scalp, or you will have unattractive purple residue.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kizer

customer_reviews.title: Effective Product
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo truly helps minimize the yellow in my grey hair. With so many senior citizens it is surprising how few stores carry this product or others like it. I used this for a few weeks before a trip to Vegas and a stranger said, "what beautiful grey hair you have." It does not remove the yellow completely, but the yellow is noticeably faded. I highly recommend this product for people with yellowish grey hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Might turn your hair purple if you're not careful. But it definitely took out the gold! I have white blonde hair that often looks yellow within a week of getting it done at the salon. I have a lot of natural red in my hair so i guess i can't expect too much. But this product made my hair look less brassy. I started mixing it with my shampoo to dilute it enough so that my ends wouldn't end up purple and to prevent dryness but now it doesn't work as well so I'm just going to go back to using it without my regular shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: laDida123

customer_reviews.title: Successful, but drying.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for two main purposes: to fade the coral dye from my hair and to keep the blonde underneath from going orange. BOTH WERE SUCCESSFUL! Below, see my before-and-after pics from using it over the span of two weeks. My only complaint is that this is HELLA drying, so I wouldn't recommend using it frequently. Where is the sulfate-free purple shampoo, beauty creators?? Where??
customer_reviews.author: LuminariaLenny

customer_reviews.title: Gets rid of brass
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo did help get the brassy color out after a few washes. I notice the side where I didn’t apply throughly looks a bit splotchy (portion where purple shampoo sat was blonder, less brassy). Note that this brand does seem to have a heavier “herbal” scent.
customer_reviews.author: J. M.

customer_reviews.title: People actually compliment me now on my beautiful hair.

customer_reviews.title: Good product

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but don’t order it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have been using it for over a year and will continue to. My only issue was with the shipping. I ordered two bottles and unfortunately neither was sealed. One of the bottles opened up during transport. When I opened the bag, both bottles were swimming in purple shampoo. A good 25% of one of the bottles spilled. I won’t order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Jedwabny

customer_reviews.title: Very drying
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo came on time in a little plastic bag inside of a box. For the product itself, it makes my hair super dry. My hair was already crispy to begin with because of bleaching, but when I would use this as a toner my hair would feel even more dry than I would like. It does tone down the brass well, but I would recommend using it probably once or twice a week .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: adequate
customer_reviews.text: This purple shampoo is okay. It does enough, but it's not spectacular. It has a lot of sulfate so you get suds for days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hair
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and the price compared to others is great . I got more than one use out of it and it helped with the bleaching procrss of my hair . A+
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo, for the money, is ok. It doesn't blondify your hair as much as you would hope and is VERY drying. Probably wouldn't buy this again, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It’s amazing I have already used it the bottle is smaller then I thought but it’s still good
customer_reviews.author: Creastine wells

customer_reviews.title: Clairol shimmer lights.
customer_reviews.text: I like this shampoo because it smells great and lathers nicely. It does what it says as far as cleansing. It helps my brown/blonde highlights hold their tone. My browns and blondes usually turn an unbearable orange color, this stops that....surprisingly! Not completely, my highlights do change somewhat but nothing like how orange it would turn before I started using this. I don't like the fact that it contain sulfates and methylparaben, and probably a few other ingredients I'd rather not use but for now this is what my stylist recommends, so I'll stick with it.
customer_reviews.author: tbsxxx

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great for me. My blonde was a little yellow initially up top which i planned onnreturning to the salon to have it touched up (not their fault went from dark brown to blonde so it was expected) this product brought my hair from a yellow blonde to a nice icey blonde and I love it! I receive so many compliments on my hair too. Wish the scent was better but its not bad!
customer_reviews.author: hayley s.

customer_reviews.title: Half gone and didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed that half the bottle was spilled inside the packaging when I received it. I really needed to use it so I just took a loss but then when I used it, it didn’t do its job!!
customer_reviews.author: Cleo

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!
customer_reviews.text: I noticed a definite lightening of my hair with only a few washes, and I really like the color it turned out. My hair is ombre right now and it didn't affect my natural dark brown hair at all. There is a slightly odd smell to the shampoo, but it doesn't linger in your hair. I've tried other silver shampoos, but this one worked the best for me.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great. I used it maybe three times so far and my hair went from yellowish blonde to ashy blonde. I love it. I don’t like the smell, it’s like a weird cinnamon. Definitely worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Smith

customer_reviews.title: small bottle
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once, but it did seem to take away some of the brassiness.
customer_reviews.author: Chark

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting color
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for colored hair. Keeps from fading and giving a brassy look. Color lasting three to four months
customer_reviews.author: Matilda

customer_reviews.title: As promised.  Worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this over many years and it has remained constant. I used it first in beauty school, over 40 years ago!! And I still use it.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great products but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is overall amazing. But don't waste your money on this is way overpriced. You can go to Walmart and get literally double the amount for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: danielle b.

customer_reviews.title: Love this and have used for years
customer_reviews.text: It came nice and neat! Not spilled out or anything! I have used this for years and it always keeps my blonde nice and well blonde not brassy!
customer_reviews.author: PAMELA SUE ROBERTS

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: The smell is very floral but nothing that I couldn't handle. I leave on 3-5 minutes about once a week and follow it with a leave in mask. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt buy again
customer_reviews.text: Have a hard time getting this shampoo to lather. Sometimes it does, sometimes it doesnt. I've used it about 3 times but can't say I've seen any results.
customer_reviews.author: katie cavallo

customer_reviews.title: Non yellowing of gray
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for its way of making my gray look less yellow.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L

product_meta.title: Clairol Shimmer Lights Original Shampoo Blonde and Silver 8 oz.
product_meta.description:
Size:8 fl. oz.
Out with brassy and in with shimmer and shine. Shimmer lights shampoo and conditioner are specialized hair care products specifically developed for silver and blonde hair, or brunette and red hair. Protein-enriched conditioning formula tones down brassiness on blonde and silver hair.
